Question: Swave Photonics CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Swave Photonics

Holographic Chip

 - Aimed to make extended reality indistinguishable from real life
 - Utilizes new display technology with materials from the memory market
 - Showcased proof of concept at CES 2024
 - Holographic eXtended Reality (HXR) display technology
 - Based on proprietary diffractive optics technology
 - Raised €7 million for accelerated development
 - Holography designed to project lifelike 3D images
